page.title: 01SUBURBAN BLACKPOOL & BEYOND.
page.content:
The survey area covers South-Eastern Blackpool and the mossland farms to the East.It is bisected from West to East by the former rail route from Kirkham to Blackpool Central, now the route of the M55 and its extension.
The Western and Northern sectors are {primarily residential although {industrial activity takes place within {these areas and on a number of {industrial estates.}The South & East of the area comprises{market-gardening {and similar horticultural operations with considerable areas under glass- houses although there has been a marked decline in this type of operation in recent years.
Further residential development is now taking place plus the growth of a large retail trading area comprising
